system
Class LowerBound

java.lang.Object
  system.LowerBound
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class LowerBound
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

Represents a lower bound for the travelling salesman problem. Uses the two smallest edges of every city to calculate a lower bound value.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam
See Also:

getLowerBoundValue

public double getLowerBoundValue()
Returns:
Lowerbound value of this object. i.e. (Sum of all real edges + virtual edges) / 2.0
